system.description: When you tend to your mortal relationships during the faction turn, make no other city moves and roll with Heart.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, one of your mortal ties demands you sacrifice part of your new life to keep them around; manage the conflict or lose the relationship.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, one of the mortals closest to you offers you a way to deepen your bond; clear a corruption advance if you agree to what they propose.

On a 7-9, agreeing isn’t so simple; what they ask of you threatens to expose them to the part of your life you’ve kept hidden.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, one of the mortals closest to you offers you a way to deepen your bond; clear a corruption advance if you agree to what they propose.
